data.title: Ralph Mangum, Author at WHKY
data.text:
Crash in N.W. Hickory Tuesday Claims the Life of 76-Year-Old Man

NEWS

Hickory Police investigated a two-vehicle traffic crash yesterday (August 6) that claimed the life of a Hickory resident. The deceased is 76-year-old Bobby Lee Ray. At about 4:50 p.m. Tuesday, Officers responded to the crash scene on the 800 block…

More Info Released in Caldwell County Murder Arrests

CRIME, NEWS

More information has been released in connection with the Caldwell County arrests of 21-year-old Felix Alexander Mejia and 18-year-old Ricci Elisabeth Cano Puerto, both from Charlotte. Mejia was charged with one count of first-degree murder and Puerto was charged with…

Hiddenite Woman Arrested on Felony Meth Charge

CRIME

25-year-old Hunter Brooke Campbell of Hiddenite was arrested by Alexander County Sheriff’s Deputies Tuesday (August 6) on charges of felony possession of methamphetamine, possession of drug paraphernalia, and driving with license revoked. Campbell is no longer listed as an inmate…

Mitchell Gold + Bob Williams Set to Resume Manufacturing Operations

NEWS

Parent company Surya Inc. has announced that 50 Mitchell Gold + Bob Williams upholstered furniture pieces are now available in more than 200 configurations for designers to purchase on Surya’s website. The curated offering includes sofas, sectionals, accent chairs, dining…

Conover Man Arrested on Fugitive Warrant from Colorado

CRIME

24-year-old Eric Chameng Thao of 2nd Street Place S.W. in Conover was arrested by Hickory Police yesterday (August 6) on a felony warrant as a fugitive awaiting extradition to another state. He is wanted in Broomfield County, Colorado for a…

Lincolnton Woman Wins Big in N.C.E.L.

NEWS

Mary Young of Lincolnton has won a won a $1 million prize in the North Carolina Education Lottery's "$10 Million Spectacular" game. Ms. Young bought the winning $50 scratch-off ticket from the Silver Express store on East King Street in…

Taylorsville Woman Jailed in Catawba County on Drug Charges; More

CRIME

44-year-old Phillisia Theighann Propst of Pine Ridge Drive in Taylorsville has been arrested in Catawba County on charges of driving while license revoked, felony possession of a schedule II controlled substance, operating a vehicle with no insurance, shoplifting with concealment…

Taylorsville Man Jailed for Violating Pretrial Release

CRIME

44-year-old Michael James Lester II of Taylorsville was arrested by Alexander County Sheriff’s Deputies Monday (August 5) for violating his pre-trial release. Lester was free on bond and awaiting trial on 2023 charges for felony breaking & entering, felony larceny,…

2024 Corporate Challenge Coming to Hickory

NEWS

For the first time since 2014, the City of Hickory is hosting the 2024 Corporate Challenge for local businesses and organizations. The challenge is an opportunity for work teams to participate in team-building activities and compete against other companies for…
